adDetails: We are an outdoor power equipment dealer/repair/sales/parts/warranty shop. --See below for some of the manufacturers we work on-- We repair all types of lawn mowers, riding mowers and tractors - we work on/repair 95% of all power equipment. We do maintenance, tune-ups, service, no-starts, sales and we do warranty work. We repair go carts, minnie bikes, pressure washers, generators, and motorhome generators. We sell new equipment, motors - blowers, lawnmowers, riding tractors, chainsaws, trimmers, tillers, weedeaters, water pumps and more and we repair and service everything we sell! Also, see us for all your parts needs. We work on power equipment from all over the northbay including; Sonoma, Santa Rosa, Windsor, Healdsburg, Rohnert Park, Cotati, Sebastopol, Petaluma, Napa, Vallejo, Novato, San Rafael, Tera Linda, Ignacio, Invernness, and Marin County - all with a great 'turn around' time. We also do fabrication work and welding. Give us a call 9 am to 4 pm Monday thru Friday show contact info www.getparsnow.com we are located at: 527 East Washington Street, Petaluma, CA just off Hwy. 101, just passed Whole Foods Market on the right. Call us at show contact info
